name: Dead Frontier 2
description: Online survival horror at its darkest. As one of the few survivors of the outbreak, you must scratch a living out of the decaying ruins of society. Scavenge for supplies, improve your skills, and trade with other players. All the while, keeping your eyes peeled for the infected lurking around every corner.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD FX Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 8550 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1050 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space
